algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by taking the square root of the rest capacity of the bin divided by the maximum bin capacity, and subtracting the item size from each of the calculated scores.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    scores = np.sqrt(rest_capacity / max_capacity) - item
    return scores
